item.title: Using your project docs inside the application
item.description: The applications I work on have markdown docs. These can be in the docs/ folder for example as docs/webhooks.md But some of these docs have value to the user of the UI not just the developer, and when we include these docs inside the application repo it is a TON easier to just update them as you fix and make new features in the codebase. You can have the best of both worlds with a simple to use library https://github.
